mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOMEGOODS_INFO ( HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO, TITLE, HOMEGOODS_CONTENTS, REG_DT, CHG_DT, USER_ID )VALUES ( HOMEGOODS_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{homegoodsContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO as homegoodsSeqNo, HI.TITLE as title, HI.HOMEGOODS_CONTENTS as homegoodsContents, HI.REG_DT as regDt, HI.CHG_DT as chgDt, HI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM HOMEGOODS_INFO HI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON HI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID

SELECT HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO as homegoodsSeqNo, HI.TITLE as title, HI.HOMEGOODS_CONTENTS as homegoodsContents, HI.REG_DT as regDt, HI.CHG_DT as chgDt, HI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM HOMEGOODS_INFO HI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON HI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE HI.HOMEGOODS_SEQ_NO = #{homegoodsSeqNo}
